data.message: I'm not showing off in the comments alright calm down I don't brag an nag for hours on end like Drake, lil wayne, Lil Uzi, and many other rappers that think they are better than shady, Tupac, and Biggie these rappers of today need to get the hell outta the spotlight for good all of us wished we could hear old school rap again but today music threw it all in the trash (that's all the bull$#!+ I'll say for now until you folks reply)

replies.message: Hey guys I just discovered 2pac! Wow new rap sucks old rap is better please give me likes I'm desperate for attention

Gregorio says the guy who has to fill in on his feed everyday of your "vegan journey" or your 1 minute excercisess get real focus on yourself instead of throwing shade at other people in the reflecrion of your own insecurity

I could'nt agree mo with u Jonathan,the current trend of hiphop is too clique and too obvious and is mo relient on technology, u dont even knw if the rapper hv a talent or nt, coz jst do the same song in different way.
